info.bio: Namaste, I am Nirjal Paudel, a fullstack software engineer from Nepal.
info.headline: I am,
description: With 3 years of experience, I am passionate about exploring, dismantling, and building systems. I enjoy contributing to open-source projects and sharing my knowledge
I thrive as a team player and find joy in collaborative work. With a strong appetite for learning, I quickly absorb new concepts and enjoy expanding my skill set.

projects.intro: Here are all my projects that I have done in my journey that describes my experience as a developer

data.name: Ecommerce
data.description: A simple ecommerce web application built using django, python. Supports various features like carts, checkout, and email

data.name: Spyder
data.description: A simple python script that scraps the internet and tries to create a simple web scraper

data.name: Postman to typescript
data.description: A simple nodejs script that looks into the postman collection json and produces typescript interfaces

helped them reduce the cost of their infrastructure
